title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
y to the fortress called Moonrise Towers. The cult of the Absolute is based at Moonrise Towers. Perhaps that is where Grand Duke Ravengard was taken. We reached Moonrise Towers. It seems unlikely that a high-value asset like Grand Duke Ravengard would be confined with other prisoners; the deeper we delve into the towers, the closer we'll be to finding him.

Pursue Ravengard's captors to Baldur's Gate.

Grand Duke Ravengard was infected with an illithid tadpole. He is being transported to Baldur'
